name: Temple Tale
description:
2D-puzzle platformer developed by the Az-Tech team at Högskolan i Skövde. https://www.facebook.com/TeamAzTech/

In the game, the player controls an explorer trapped in an Aztec temple filled with traps and spirits. To escape, she is forced to cooperate with an evil spirit in a mask, who grants her the ability to switch between the spirit world and the real one. 

The game is in 2D, and the player solves puzzles to advance through the temple. The
puzzles are based around the player pulling boxes which move in pairs, and using the mask’s ability to switch between worlds to activate and deactivate various puzzle components.

Tutorial:
Use arrow keys to move around. Press space to jump. Press ‘x’ to switch between spirit and real world. Press and hold ‘z’ to grab boxes. Press ‘r’ to restart.
